Configuring Management IP Pool

To configure Management IP Pool, perform the following:

 1. Choose the desired Assignment Order.

a. Default

b. Sequential

 2. Complete the text boxes and click Add to generate IP Pool.

Table 5-2 Management IP Pool

Item

Description

Starting IP Address

Enter the commencing IP address

Default Gateway

Enter the IP address for the default gateway

Number of IP Address

Enter the required number of IP address

Subnet Mask

Enter the IP address of the Subnet Mask

DNS

Enter the DNS id.

Figure 5-11 Configuring Management IP Pool

 3. Click Save and Next to proceed further.
